summary.span: 提供與目前應用程式相關的屬性、方法和事件。

span.span: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所公開的屬性`My.Application`物件只與目前的應用程式或 DLL 相關聯的傳回資料。The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL. 使用 `My.Application` 無法改變任何系統層級資訊。No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`. `My.Application` 物件包含下列類別：The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - 提供適用於所有專案的成員。 provides members that are available in all projects. - 提供適用於 Windows Forms 應用程式的成員。 provides members available in Windows Forms applications. - 提供適用於主控台應用程式的成員。 provides members available in console applications. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`屬性可檢查應用程式的命令列引數。This example uses the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property to examine the application's command-line arguments. 如果引數會找到開頭`/input=`，該引數的其餘部分會顯示。If an argument is found that starts with `/input=`, the rest of that argument is displayed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandLineArgs As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

summary.span: 取得集合，包含做為目前應用程式之字串 (String) 的命令列引數。

span.span: Gets a collection containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.

value.span: 的 ，包含做為目前應用程式之字串的命令列引數。

span.span: A of , containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.CommandLineArgs`屬性會提供目前的應用程式不是 ClickOnce 部署的應用程式的命令列引數的唯讀存取。The `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property provides read-only access to the current application's command-line arguments for applications that are not ClickOnce deployed. 為單一執行個體的應用程式，`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`屬性會傳回第一個執行個體的應用程式的命令列引數。For a single-instance application, the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property returns the command-line arguments for the first instance of an application. 若要存取後續嘗試啟動單一執行個體的應用程式的引數，您必須處理事件，並檢查屬性引數。To access the arguments for subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application, you must handle the event and examine the property of the argument. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.CommandLineArgs`屬性會傳回命令列引數。The `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property returns only the command-line arguments. 這是不同的行為屬性，會傳回除了引數的應用程式名稱。This is different from the behavior of the property, which returns the application name in addition to the arguments. > [!NOTE] > 在 ClickOnce 部署是應用程式，使用屬性`My.Application.Deployment`以取得命令列引數的物件。In an application that is ClickOnce deployed, use the property of the `My.Application.Deployment` object to get the command-line arguments. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 下表列出與工作的範例`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`屬性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |檢查後續嘗試啟動單一執行個體的應用程式的命令列引數Check the command-line arguments of subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application|| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`屬性可檢查應用程式的命令列引數。This example uses the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property to examine the application's command-line arguments. 如果引數會找到開頭`/input=`，該引數的其餘部分會顯示。If an argument is found that starts with `/input=`, the rest of that argument is displayed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

permission.span: 控制存取的 PATH 環境變數的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access the PATH environment variable.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Deployment As ApplicationDeployment

summary.span: 取得目前應用程式的 ClickOnce 部署物件，其提供以程式設計方式更新目前部署的支援，以及視需要下載檔案的支援。

span.span: Gets the current application's ClickOnce deployment object, which provides support for updating the current deployment programmatically and support for the on-demand download of files.

value.span: 傳回應用程式之 ClickOnce 部署的 物件。

span.span: Returns the object for the application's ClickOnce deployment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Deployment`屬性會傳回應用程式的 ClickOnce物件。The `My.Application.Deployment` property returns the application's ClickOnce object. 物件支援以程式設計方式更新目前的部署，以及支援視需要下載的檔案。The object provides support for updating the current deployment programmatically as well as support for the on-demand download of files. 如需有關 ClickOnce 應用程式和部署方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ClickOnce 安全性和部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a)並[發行 ClickOnce 應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973)。For more information on ClickOnce applications and how to deploy them, see [ClickOnce Security and Deployment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a) and [Publishing ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973). 確認屬性是`True`您在存取之前`My.Application.Deployment`屬性。Confirm that the property is `True` before you access the `My.Application.Deployment` property. 否則，如果不使用 ClickOnce 來部署應用程式，讀取`My.Application.Deployment`屬性會導致例外狀況。Otherwise, if the application is not deployed using ClickOnce, reading the `My.Application.Deployment` property results in an exception. 如需有關部署 ClickOnce 應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 發行 ClickOnce 應用程式使用發行精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127). 如需有關使用`My.Application.Deployment`屬性，請參閱 < [Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information on using the `My.Application.Deployment` property, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會下載並安裝在檢查的應用程式網路部署之後更新。This example downloads and installs the update after checking that the application is network-deployed. 方法不會更新應用程式，除非它已過期。The method does not update the application unless it is out of date. 應用程式必須重新啟動，才能使用更新。The application has to restart to use the update. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#4)] ClickOnce 部署的應用程式可以使用更新`My.Application.Deployment`物件。Only applications that are ClickOnce deployed can be updated using the `My.Application.Deployment` object. 如需有關部署 ClickOnce 應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 發行 ClickOnce 應用程式使用發行精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127).

exception.span: 應用程式未部署為 ClickOnce 應用程式。

span.span: The application is not deployed as a ClickOnce application.

permission.span: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Property InternalCommandLine As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

summary.span: 將值設為目前應用程式的命令列引數。

span.span: Sets the values to use as the current application's command-line arguments.

value.span: 的 ，包含用做目前應用程式之命令列引數的字串。

span.span: A of , containing the strings to use as the command-line arguments for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您設定所使用的命令列引數的內部值類別。This method allows you to set the internal value of the command-line arguments used by the class. 這個屬性會決定屬性會傳回。This property determines what the property returns. 如果您未設定這個屬性，或您將這個屬性設定為`Nothing`，則屬性會取得命令列引數，從屬性。If you do not set this property, or you set this property to `Nothing`, the property obtains the command-line arguments from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsNetworkDeployed As Boolean
public: property bool IsNetworkDeployed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，表示是否使用 ClickOnce 從網路部署應用程式。

span.span: Gets a that represents whether the application was deployed from a network using ClickOnce.

value.span: ，表示是否從網路部署應用程式。

span.span: A that represents whether the application was deployed from a network.

value.span: 如果已從網路部署目前的應用程式則值為 ，否則值為 。

span.span: The value is if the current application was deployed from a network; otherwise the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed`屬性會指出是否已從網路，使用 ClickOnce 部署應用程式。The `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` property indicates whether the application was deployed from a network using ClickOnce. 如需有關 ClickOnce 應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ClickOnce 安全性和部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a)。For more information on ClickOnce applications, see [ClickOnce Security and Deployment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a). 這個屬性是，您應該確認`True`您在存取之前屬性。You should confirm that this property is `True` before you access the property. 否則，如果未從網路，使用 ClickOnce 部署應用程式，讀取`My.Application.Deployment`屬性會導致例外狀況。Otherwise, if the application is not deployed from a network using ClickOnce, reading the `My.Application.Deployment` property results in an exception. 如需有關如何設定 ClickOnce 的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 發行 ClickOnce 應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973)。For more information on configuring ClickOnce, see [Publishing ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973). 如需有關部署 ClickOnce 應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 發行 ClickOnce 應用程式使用發行精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127). 如需有關使用`My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed`屬性，請參閱 < [Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information on using the `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` property, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會下載並安裝在檢查應用程式從網路部署之後更新。This example downloads and installs the update after checking that the application is deployed from a network. 方法不會更新應用程式，除非它已過期。The method does not update the application unless it is out of date. 應用程式必須重新啟動，才能使用更新。The application has to restart to use the update. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#4)] ClickOnce 部署的應用程式可以使用更新`My.Application.Deployment`物件。Only applications that are ClickOnce-deployed can be updated using the `My.Application.Deployment` object. 如需有關部署 ClickOnce 應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 發行 ClickOnce 應用程式使用發行精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127).
